lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Democrat known for his close ties with pro-Israel groups said the agreement was “imperfect” but was the “most preferable vehicle to prevent Iran from developing a nuclear weapon.”

headline.main: Representative Hakeem Jeffries Says He Will Vote for Iran Nuclear Deal

snippet: The Brooklyn Democrat known for his close ties with pro-Israel groups said the agreement was “imperfect” but was the “most preferable vehicle to prevent Iran from developing a nuclear weapon.”
